predicate.note: Frames file for 'blink' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 40.3.1-1, Framenet entry Body_movement.

roleset.name: close eyes for a second

example.name: transitive
example.text: You look around at professional ballplayers or accountants ... and nobody blinks an eye.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The White House had the perfect case, but Congress blinked before it could go to court.
example.arg: before it could go to court

roleset.note: This kind of intransitive usage actually has a special meaning of "back down", but it's not worth a separate sense.
